item.title: Re: The price of GoldCoin is stuck
item.description: I am going to sell 50,000 GoldCoin to test the marketplace on Bittrex. They will be sold in 1000 coin lots approximately 10% above the highest bid price to see if the community responds.  If so I will set about putting up another 50,000.

item.title: Re: GoldCoin Mac Client
item.description:
Hello -
yes, i've tried that 4 times so far and same result everytime
along with that message it brings it a "quit unexpectedly" box also some of the time
shows the below msg:
GoldCoin-Qt quit unexpectedly.
Click Reopen to open the application again.
...

item.title: Re: The price of GoldCoin is stuck
item.description: It is hard to have any certainty about the price of GoldCoin or any other Cryptocurrency including Bitcoin (BTC). It is all in the story about how to use the currency. Someone will come up with a reasonable strategy that everyone will start using.
